rawls.scene.details¶

Rawls rendering details information

rawls.scene.details.resolution¶

{Resolution} – x and y resolution of image

rawls.scene.details.samples¶

{int} – number of samples used for generate image

rawls.scene.details.pixelfilter¶

{Filter} – pixelfilter instance with information

rawls.scene.details.sampler¶

{Sampler} – sampler instance with information

rawls.scene.details.accelerator¶

{Accelerator} – accelerator instance with information

rawls.scene.details.integrator¶

{Integrator} – integrator instance with information

rawls.scene.details.camera¶

{Camera} – camera instance with information

rawls.scene.details.lookAt¶

{LookAt} – look at instance with eye, point and up vector

class rawls.scene.details.Details(resolution, samples, pixelfilter, sampler, accelerator, integrator, camera, lookAt)[source]¶
classmethod fromcomments(self, comments)[source]¶

Instanciate Details object with all comments information

Parameters

comments – {str} – extracted comments data

Returns

{Details} – details information instance

classmethod _extract_params(self, line)[source]¶

Extract params information of module :param line: {str} – params line of rawls file of renderer element

Returns

[([{str}], [{str}], [{str}])] – tuple of names, values and types of params extracted

__str__(self)[source]¶

Display Details object representation

Returns

{str} – details information

to_rawls(self)[source]¶

Display Details information for .rawls file

Returns

{str} – details information for .rawls file
